resources.string: This is how it’ll appear on your profile.\nCan’t Change it later.
Upload a photos of yourself\n the photo will be visible to the public.
Upload 4 or more photos of your flat.
Enter the maximum number of flatmates you want (excluding you).
Enter the number of flatmates occupied (excluding you).
Enter the OTP sent to ayu*********i@gmail.com
Didn’t recieve the OTP ? click here to resend
